archimate:FlowRelationship.name: remote-write
archimate:FlowRelationship.documentation: remote_write: - url: "http://<remote-write-endpoint>/api/v1/write" # Other configuration options like `remote_timeout`, `queue_config` can be added here write_relabel_configs: - source_labels: ["__name__"] regex: "^(metric_name_1|metric_name_2|another_metric_name)$" action: keep
